name: Cooke's Crating & Fine Arts Transportation
description: Specialized fine art transportation, installation, and storage services for private art collectors in Los Angeles. We offer discreet, white-glove service, logistical consultation, and long-term preservation advice.

itemOffered.name: Residential Art Installation
itemOffered.description: Expert installation of artwork in private residences, ensuring precision and care in living spaces.

itemOffered.name: Discreet Art Transportation
itemOffered.description: Confidential and secure transport services prioritizing client privacy and security.

itemOffered.name: Collection Management Consultation
itemOffered.description: Consulting on logistics, display advice, and long-term preservation strategies for private collections.

itemOffered.name: Secure Private Storage
itemOffered.description: Climate-controlled facilities offering protection against environmental risks for stored collections.

review.reviewBody: Many thanks to Dave and Keenan for their help. I work with art handlers across the country and was impressed with their knowledge and professionalism in handling my client's art work.
I wanted to tell you what a pleasure it was to work with you and your organization. I truly appreciate your ability to organize and keep things on trackâ€”especially with such a quick turnaround.
